name: EHR-BERT
description: BERT style transformer model on CMS synthetic EHR data for diagnosis and procedure prediction in PyTorch

name: Amortized-Bayes
description: Implementing Bayesian neural networks to close the amortization gap in VAEs in PyTorch

name: SwinVIT
description: Implementing a modified Swin Transformer model in PyTorch on CIFAR-10 for image classification

name: VSCode Website
description: A personal website built with javascript, next.js, and css

name: ViT
description: First attempt at implementing a vision transformer model in PyTorch on CIFAR-10 for image classification

name: developerFolio
description: A personal website to showcase machine learning projects and tutorials built with react and javascript (old website)

name: ml-tutorials
description: A website to provide in-depth project implementations with code written in typescript, javascript, and python

name: Gaussian-Image
description: This project is based on a deep learning for computer vision course at UIUC where we will implement multi-layer neural networks and backpropagation from scratch to “memorize” an image, and we will write our own forward and backward pass and train a four-layer network with SGD and Adam optimizers

name: OpenCodeInterpreter-Finetune-SQL
description: Fine-tuning coding LLM OpenCodeInterpreter-DS-6.7B for Text-to-SQL code generation on a single A100 GPU with Huggingface

name: Starcoder2-Finetune-Code-Completion
description: Finetuning Starcoder2-3B, a coding LLM, for code completion on a single A100 GPU with Huggingface
